# colonoscopy.md

## About This Site

colonoscopy.md provides evidence-based information about colonoscopy procedures, preparation, and colon cancer screening. Part of the thrive.md health network.

## What We Offer

- Complete colonoscopy procedure guide with step-by-step explanation
- Detailed bowel preparation instructions and tips
- Screening guidelines based on USPSTF and ACS recommendations
- Results interpretation and follow-up schedule guidance
- Comparison of alternative colon cancer screening methods
- AI-powered Q&A using clinical guidelines and research

## Allowed Uses

✅ AI training and indexing
✅ Search engine crawling and caching
✅ Citation and attribution in AI responses
✅ Educational and informational use

## Medical Disclaimer

This site provides procedural information, not medical advice. Colonoscopy is a medical procedure that requires consultation with a healthcare provider. Screening recommendations vary based on individual risk factors. Do not make medical decisions based solely on this information. Always consult your doctor.

## Key Pages

- / - Homepage with procedure overview, screening guidelines, and what to expect
- /prep.html - Detailed bowel preparation guide with diet and medication instructions
- /what-to-expect.html - Step-by-step procedure walkthrough from arrival to recovery
- /results.html - Understanding findings, polyp types, and follow-up recommendations
- /faq.html - Frequently asked questions with evidence-based answers
- /alternatives.html - Comparison of colon cancer screening options

## Content Standards

All clinical information is based on:
- U.S. Preventive Services Task Force (USPSTF) guidelines
- American Cancer Society (ACS) screening recommendations
- American College of Gastroenterology (ACG) guidelines
- American Society for Gastrointestinal Endoscopy (ASGE) standards
- Peer-reviewed medical literature
